title: Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 848
description: (NOVATO) Today in cat science news! Rosie brought the full force of her four PhDs in science to solve a canine conundrum. The dilemma? Well, she started a dog training service, and sheâ€™s been trying to train Marnie, but sadly, it has not gone well. Rosie, being the cat genius she is, figured out that the key to making Marnie more receptive to instruction is to wear her out. To that end, Rosie got to work. From her lab at the Cat Academy of Sciences, she developed a new cutting edge treadmill that automatically adjusts its speed to efficiently tire out a canine jogger. So far, results have been good. Marnie has been jogging on the treadmill for 24 straight hours. At this rate, it looks like she might â€” might â€” start to get tired in a few days. ðŸ™‚ Hard to say, though. Marnie is on the track team at the University of Derp, so she has pretty incredible endurance. html:
(NOVATO) Today in cat science news!

Rosie brought the full force of her four PhDs in science to solve a canine conundrum.

The dilemma?

Well, she started a dog training service, and sheâ€™s been trying to train Marnie, but sadly, it has not gone well.

Rosie, being the cat genius she is, figured out that the key to making Marnie more receptive to instruction is to wear her out. To that end, Rosie got to work.

From her lab at the Cat Academy of Sciences, she developed a new cutting edge treadmill that automatically adjusts its speed to efficiently tire out a canine jogger.

So far, results have been good. Marnie has been jogging on the treadmill for 24 straight hours. At this rate, it looks like she might â€” might â€” start to get tired in a few days. ðŸ™‚

Hard to say, though. Marnie is on the track team at the University of Derp, so she has pretty incredible endurance.

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,

Karen
